data.message: A friend received a post with my name that did not come from me. It was a link to the Web Site: No One Cares. The user posting the link was Uuiy @No One Cares.  It didn't fit any of your categories for reporting posts sos I am posting the details here. I  have changed my password but I was wondering if you had any further advice.

replies.message: Hi Charles. If this is a fake account, please report it to us: http://bit.ly/2yWygFH. You can also report this post as spam by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2zVVCJx. -Jessica

Facebook I could only verify the web site link. The user’s name was not a liver link. I couldn’t tell if he or she mirrored my account or came through my friends account. I do have a screenshot of the post if you have a place to send it.
Uuily is not on my friends list.
Hi Charles .Can you please help promote my Facebook page
